channel.title: Getting players? :F
channel.description:
I think this is in right section.. If not mod please move it.
What would be the best way to get players on my RSPS? Besides paying websites to advertise for me. I advertised on rs-ps and got like players but now back down to 4.. Any ideas?

item.title: Getting players? :F
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

[quote=“Vexillum, post:5, topic:402373”]Thanks for the help guys, its posted on google,mopar, and google but 1 player gets on at a time… and they do ::players and see there is like 2 ppl on they just log off… and its a continuous process… It doesn’t get me any players unless I advertise somewhere.[/quote] Then you need to tell them more cool features so they enjoy it anyways and more people will join and enjoy it. You could also have you or some people wait by the area where new players spawn and tell them some cool stuff about the server or give them something.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting players? :F
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

Thanks for the help guys, its posted on runelocus,mopar, and rune-server but 1 player gets on at a time… and they do ::players and see there is like 2 ppl on they just log off… and its a continuous process… It doesn’t get me any players unless I advertise somewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting players? :F
item.dc:creator: @Microsoft11 Microsoft1
item.description:
@Microsoft11 wrote:

Hello,

We cannot advertise other websites on this forum.

I can suggest using a search engine and searching for: “RSPS Server list”.

That’s about all I can tell you!

Thank you, good luck!

Read full topic

item.title: Getting players? :F
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

[quote=“Microsoft1, post:2, topic:402373”]Hello,

You’ll need to get out there and advertise your server!

Many places allow you to advertise for free, and to keep your server in the top rankings, make sure you keep the down time to a minimum, the more it’s down, the more it will drop down the list.

Try this for a start: http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php

Thank you![/quote]

Registered it there, 100% uptime, Anyone know any good places to advertise to get players?

Read full topic

item.title: Getting players? :F
item.dc:creator: @Microsoft11 Microsoft1
item.description:
@Microsoft11 wrote:

Hello,

You’ll need to get out there and advertise your server!

Many places allow you to advertise for free, and to keep your server in the top rankings, make sure you keep the down time to a minimum, the more it’s down, the more it will drop down the list.

Try this for a start: http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php

Thank you!

Read full topic
